com.rakuten.android.ads.runa

Enum AdSize


  • public enum AdSize

    This class defines the size of AdView.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • DEFAULT

        public static AdSize DEFAULT

        The ad size that set in DashBoard.

      • ASPECT_FIT

        public static AdSize ASPECT_FIT

        The ad is automatically adjusted to the screen width without changing the aspect ratio of the ad.

      • CUSTOM

        public static AdSize CUSTOM

        Can be specified to any size(pixel). However, this specify is calculated based on the width. Specifiable range: (DEFAULT < CUSTOM < ASPECT_FIT)

      • get

        public int get()
